EmailTemplate.description: Email to notify the field that an extension is needed to less than 7 days for a RFP
EmailTemplate.name: WRF Extension Needed - Less 7 Days Window
EmailTemplate.subject: WRF Extension Needed - Less Than 7 Days Window: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Case.WRF_Requestor_Name__c},
Thank you for your Work Request submission for {!Case.Account}. We appreciate the opportunity to work with you.
This bid is due {!Case.WRF_Prpsl_Deadln__c}. Our standard turn around time to complete a bid request is 10 to 13 business days. In order to take the applicable support teams, this opportunity need an extension to at least to . Please confirm within 24 hours of receipts of this email that an extension has been granted. At that time this support will be tasked to the applicable teams.
If an extension is not confirmed, this support will be closed.
Thank you
BSD BIDS
